plot: A student must hand in a short movie as assignment for a class. The short movie can't be longer than 5 minutes or shorter than 3. Is it possible to tell a story in such a short time?
title: Short Time
plot_es: A student must hand in a short movie as assignment for a class. The short movie can't be longer than 5 minutes or shorter than 3. Is it possible to tell a story in such a short time?
plot_en: A student must hand in a short movie as assignment for a class. The short movie can't be longer than 5 minutes or shorter than 3. Is it possible to tell a story in such a short time?
